title: ShrimpyChris
author: ShrimpyChris
content: If you're a U.S. citizen looking for a simple and effective way to invest in cryptocurrencies, Shrimpy Advisory is the perfect solution. Our automated investment advisory service takes the guesswork out of investment decisions, helping you make informed choices that align with your own personal investment goals and risk tolerance. With Shrimpy Advisory, you'll have access to investment advice without the hassle of traditional investment services.Don't waste any more time trying to navigate the complex world of cryptocurrency investing on your own - email us at AdvisorySupport@Shrimpy.io and request entry into our closed beta to get started!

comments.author: ShrimpyChris
comments.body: Not a scam, but I'd love to know what gives you that idea?
